nodes.text: The ShadoWing-4 was a civilian para-wing glider based on Imperial Military gliders. Its geomorphous wings allowed for superior mobility, and the on-board repulsorlift generator allowed for a flight ceiling of 5 kilometers. However, the ShadoWing-4 was a fragile design and not recommended for use in hazardous weather. Safety features included a sensor beacon, navigational equipment and emergency thrusters.
Alliance Special Forces often modified the ShadoWing for use by Pathfinders and Infiltrators, by removing the beacon to avoid detection.
